GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET.description: Get all comments for an article. Responds with an array of comments for the given article_id, each with the following properties: comment_id, votes, created_at, author, body, article_id. Comments are served with the most recent comments first.
